name: cfslider
description:
Puts a slider control, for selecting a numeric value from a
 range, in a ColdFusion form. The slider moves over the slider
 groove. As the user moves the slider, the current value
 displays. Used within a cfform tag.
 Not supported with Flash forms.

params.name: name
params.description: Name for cfslider control.

params.name: label
params.description:
Label to display with control.
 For example, "Volume" This displays: "Volume %value%"
 To reference the value, use "%value%". If %% is omitted,
 slider value displays directly after label.

params.name: range
params.description:
Numeric slider range values.
 Separate values with a comma.

params.name: scale
params.description:
Unsigned integer. Defines slider scale, within range.
 For example: if range = "0,1000" and scale = "100",
 the display values are: 0, 100, 200, 300, ...
 Signed and unsigned integers in ColdFusion are in the
 range -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647.

params.name: value
params.description: Starting slider setting. Must be within the range values.

params.name: onvalidate
params.description:
Custom JavaScript function to validate user input; in this
 case, a change to the default slider value. Specify only
 the function name.

params.name: message
params.description: Message text to appear if validation fails.

params.name: height
params.description: Slider control height, in pixels.

params.name: width
params.description: Slider control width, in pixels.

params.name: vspace
params.description: Vertical spacing above and below slider, in pixels.

params.name: hspace
params.description: Horizontal spacing to left and right of slider, in pixels.

params.name: align
params.description:
Alignment of slider:
 * top
 * left
 * bottom
 * baseline
 * texttop
 * absbottom
 * middle
 * absmiddle
 * right

params.name: lookandfeel
params.description:
- motif: renders slider in Motif style
 - windows: renders slider in Windows style
 - metal: renders slider in Java Swing style
 If platform does not support style option, tag defaults to
 platform default style.
 Default: windows

params.name: vertical
params.description:
Yes: Renders slider in browser vertically. You must set
 width and height attributes; ColdFusion does not
 automatically swap width and height values.
 No: Renders slider horizontally.

params.name: bgcolor
params.description:
Background color of control. For a hex value, use the form:
 textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
 signs or none.

params.name: textcolor
params.description:
Text color for control. For a hex value, use the form:
 textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
 signs or none.

params.name: font
params.description: Font name for data in tree control.

params.name: fontsize
params.description: Font size for text in tree control, in points.

params.name: italic
params.description:
Yes: displays tree control text in italics
 No: it does not

params.name: bold
params.description:
Yes: displays tree control text in bold
 No: it does not

params.name: notsupported
params.description:
Text to display if a page that contains a Java applet-based
 cfform control is opened by a browser that does not
 support Java or has Java support disabled.
params.default:
Browser must support Java to
view ColdFusion Java Applets!

params.name: clickToChange
params.description: Whether clicking the slider changes the value of the pointer:

params.name: max
params.description: Maximum value for the slider.

params.name: onChange
params.description:
Custom JavaScript function to run when slider value changes.
Specify only the function name.

params.name: min
params.description: Minimum value for the slider.

params.name: onDrag
params.description:
Custom JavaScript function to run when you drag the slider.
Specify only the function name.

params.name: onError
params.description:
Custom JavaScript function to run if validation fails.
Specify only the function name.

params.name: increment
params.description: The unit increment value for a snapping slider.

params.name: tip
params.description: Whether the data valu has to display as data tips

params.name: format
params.description: Specifies if the format is:html/applet
